author: rwesten
msg: minor: Merged fix in the unit test from trunk

author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-797: the opennlp-ner engine now also adds NER annotations to the AnalyzedText contentpart. This feature is only active if an AnalyzedText contentpart is already present. It does NOT create one.
